scripts.release-patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore:Update CHANGELOG.md' && release-it patch
scripts.release-minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore:Update CHANGELOG.md' && release-it minor
scripts.release-major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore:Update CHANGELOG.md' && release-it major
